text: Poonilamazha is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film written and directed by Sunil. The film was produced by Bindu and Nisha under the banner of Ponthara Films and distributed by Fax Release.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-8CDj69fgRU It stars Sanjay Mitra and Shraddha Nigam in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sanjay Mitra as Manu Varma /Manikuttan * Shraddha Nigam as Anu *Sarath Babu as Chandran * Rekha as Leena * Thilakan as Prathapa Varma *Janardhanan as Abhimana Varma * Prem Kumar as Shakthi Varma * Nedumudi Venu as Dr. Balagopal *Bindu Panicker as Bharathi *Jose Pellissery as Swamy * Santhakumari *Kalabhavan Haneef *Yadu Krishnan *Usha Rani *Nandhu as Goutham *Santha Kumari as Ammuedathi == Soundtrack == The film's soundtrack contains 7 songs, all composed by Bollywood composer duo Laxmikant–Pyarelal. Lyrics by Gireesh Puthenchery, Sameer. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Indian films Category:1997 films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Sunil Category:Films scored by Laxmikant–Pyarelal
title: Poonilamazha
